scripts.build: pnpm run sync-version && rm -rf dist && vite build && cp src/content/content.js dist/content.js
scripts.publish: pnpm run build && pnpm run zip && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") ./dist/blogmine-$(node -p "require('./package.json').version").zip -t "v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" -n "ğŸ”– blogmine ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ ë¦´ë¦¬ìŠ¤"
